structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST THE STATE AND PUBLIC JUSTICE

law.catch_line: Contempt of court by witness, juror, officer.
law.text: Witnesses, jurors and officers of courts, for disobeying a summons of court, or neglecting to execute or make due return of a subpoena or order of court or other judicial officer, may be punished for contempt.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 442, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1293.
